name: Crossing Mayhem
description:
Controls

Move:  <- LeftArrow AND -> RightArrow

Jump: ^ UpArrow OR Space Bar

Play as an creature from the 2º dimension who's have appeared in the middle of a car tunnel, and try to survive the mayhem in the city.

People have gone insane because of the sudden appearance of a being from another dimension, help the little guy survive the crazy population.

Font Assets: https://www.dafont.com/pt/the-bubble-letters.font

3D Models: Broken Vectors Unity asset store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/low-poly-cars-101798

Car audio effects: Edited* https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/car-driving-...
